text: The Mark of the Maker is a 1991 American short documentary film about manual papermaking, produced by David McGowan. It was nominated for an Academy Award for Best Documentary Short. ==References== ==External links== *The Mark of the Maker at Direct Cinema Limited * Category:1991 films Category:1991 short films Category:1991 documentary films Category:American films Category:English- language films Category:American documentary films Category:American independent films Category:American short films Category:Papermaking Category:Short documentary films Category:1991 independent films
title: The Mark of the Maker
